abstract: Vivendi and General Electric will have an intricate dance on their hands if Vivendi decides to push forward with a disposition of its one-fifth stake in NBC Universal.
snippet: Vivendi and General Electric will have an intricate dance on their hands if Vivendi decides to push forward with a disposition of its one-fifth stake in NBC Universal.
lead_paragraph: Jean-Bernard Levy, the chief executive of the French media conglomerate Vivendi, has recently hinted that Vivendi is ready to dispose of its 20 percent stake in NBC Universal.
